name: Agent Pink
description:
ALIEN INVASION ON EARTH

The earth has been invaded by aliens and we are on the verge of being wiped out... Agent Pink has been playing with guns since he was ten years old, so he takes it upon himself to save mankind from the aliens. They have spread themselves across five locations, before they go further, agent Pink has to kill them all.

Will he be able to do so? And to what extent?

Approximate gameplay length: 20-30 minutes(if you're good)
